ComicInfo.Title: Mother Sleepless, Part 2; Hell on Board, Part 2; The Heartbreak, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: The series where creators reimagine classic monsters for the 21st century is back for our third volume of original tales of terror! This issue keeps the horror train running with new installments of "Mother Sleepless," "The Heartbreak," and "Hell On Board!" Join for another frightening issue of American Mythology Monsters! This issue comes with two covers - Main by legendary comic artist Neil Vokes and a Racy Mermaid variant by the Corpse Crew team of Buz Hasson and Ken Haeser!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-17 22:12:22. [CVDB1028450]
ComicInfo.Writer: Glenn Møane, Konstantine Paradias, S.A. Check
ComicInfo.Letterer: Guido Martinez, James Couts, Jeff Eckleberry
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Blair Smith, Buzz Hasson, Ken Haeser, Matt Webb, Neil Vokes
